content: did you know an army survival manual in the 70s strongly recommended covering the head when it is cold since 40 to 45 percent of body heat is lost from the head as iconic as maple syrup or *tim hortons* coffee the canadian knitted * tuque * is a winter tradition this pattern is a simple go-to recipe that will work up quickly and fit any head size thanks to the super stretchy rib ideal for a beginner who wants to try their first hat project please enjoy this free knitting pattern and if you would like future notice of more free patterns follow me at @muskokayarn on instagram and @muskokayarnconnection on facebook
